comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110312 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110312 Firefox/4.0b13pre

when I open the download manager, sometimes in the search box and button list are clear cut in half or they disappear

Original Message in portuguese:
quando abro o gerenciador de downloads,  em algumas vezes a caixa de busca e o botão de clear list ficam cortados pela metade ou eles somem

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1.abra o firefox
2.open download manager with ctrl+j
Actual Results:  
the search box and button list are clear cut in half

the search box and button list are clear cut in half

Original Message in portuguese:
a caixa de busca e o botão de clear list ficam cortados ao meio



Expected Results:  
that the search box and clear list button is rendered correctly, without being cut in half
Original Message in portuguese:
que a caixa de busca e o botão clear list sejam renderizados  corretamente, sem estarem cortados ao meio

Windows 7 x64 Professional Original
NVIDIA 7300GS

Screenshot
http://img98.imageshack.us/i/bugdownloadmanager.jpg/

comments.raw_text: clean profile of Windows? new user account?
comments.text: clean profile of Windows? new user account?

comments.raw_text:
If you can reproduce the issue on a new Firefox profile than it is likely to be a bug. Here you can find details on how to create a new Firefox profile:
http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Profiles
